attributes.additional_details: We want the government to rethink about how to protect children online. Censorship doesn't help education about online porn, media literacy and parents putting parent control features in place does… we can protect children without turning the internet into a digital police station.
attributes.background:
Sign this to repeal the online safety act 2025
It is descised as an act to protect and save children but in reality they have gone the wrong way about it, asking people to submit sensitive information to 3ed party companies that are over seas and don't have to abide by GDPR regulations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722903
